The relationship between Ghislaine Maxwell and the 
Montpelier Trust is unknown at this time. It can be inferred 
that there is a relationship between Ghislaine Maxwell and 
the Montpelier Trust due to the following: 
(1) On 6/24/2019, $785,339 and was transferred from 
Ghislaine Maxwell's UBS account o the UBS 
Montpelier Trust account 
(2) On 7/2/2020, Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested at 
residence located at Bradford NH. On 
12/13/2019, Granite Reality LLC purchased that property in 
an all cash transaction for $1,070,800. The address listed for 
Granite Reality LLC is -Boston MA 02210-
2698. The address, excluding the ZIP code, is identical to 
Montpelier Trust's address.

The relationship between Ghislaine Maxwell and the 
Montpelier Trust is unknown at this time. It can be inferred 
that there is a relationship between Ghislaine Maxwell and 
the Montpelier Trust due to the following: 
(1) On March 13, 2019, 5500,000 was transferred from 
Ghislaine Maxwell's UBS account to the UBS 
Montpelier Trust account 
(2) On 3/17/2020, $3,560.59 was transferred from the 
Montpelier Trust's UBS account to the USAA 
Federal Savings Bank account titled Scott Borgerson Or 
Ghislaine Maxwell 
(3) On 7/2/2020, Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested at 
residence located at Bradford NH. On 
12/13/2019, Granite Reality LLC purchased that property in 
an all cash transaction for 51,070,800. The address listed for 
Granite Reality LLC is Boston MA 02210-
2698. The address, excluding the ZIP code, is identical to 
Montpelier Trust's address. 
BARCLAYS N/A 
Source - Form 114 ("FBAR") filed on 10/13/19 filed with the 
U.S. Treasury Department's Financial Crimes and 
Enforcement Network ("FinCEN") on behalf of Ghislaine 
Maxwell. The FBAR states that the maximum account value 
in 2018 was $1,556,801. The current balance of this account 
is unknown. 
BARCLAYS N/A 
Source - FBAR filed with FinCEN on 10/13/19 filed on behalf 
of Ghislaine Maxwell. The FBAR states that the maximum 
account value in 2018 was $644,686. The current balance of 
this account is unknown. 
BARCLAYS N/A 
Source - FBAR filed on 10/13/19 filed with FinCEN on behalf 
of Ghislaine Maxwell. The FBAR states that the maximum 
account value in 2018 was $41,291. The current balance of 
this account is unknown.
